```{r}
library(httr)

# save to env environment
connectAPIKey <- "enter key"

# make an API call
resp <- GET("https://colorado.rstudio.com/rsc/content/4411/sum?y=2&x=5",
    add_headers(Authorization = paste0("Key ", connectAPIKey)),
    verbose())


```
